title: robomessage
description: A message used by robomaze-like robots for mutual communication.

roboId.description: The unique identifier of the robot that is the message author [area].[destination].[purpose].[name] i.e. 'household.kitchen.cleaning.dishwasher_az' or 'household.house.cleaning.vacuum_cleaner_wx' or 'household.living_room.power_supply.plug_abc'.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message. If not provided it should be generated by robocloud and returned in the success response.

purpose.description: The purpose of the message. This is what defines the 'data' property structure.

messageTime.description: The time when the message was emitted in format [Y-m-dTH:i:s (ISO 8601) UTC]. If not provided it should be generated by robocloud.

tags.description: Arbitrary set of tags relevant to the specific message.

data.description: An arbitrary list of key-values to provide more context to the message.

responseTo.description: The origin value of the message to which is this message a response.

recipients.description: The unique identifiers of the robots that are supposed to receive the message.

recipientWildcard.description: The roboId wildcard to aim for a group of robots.
